typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		TotalCost as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UnitCost as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 join(source1@OrderID == source2@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 derive(SourceSystemID = 1,
		GlobalCustomerID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		OrderID = source1@OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost,
		CreatedDate = source1@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = source1@UpdatedDate,
		OrderDetailID,
		OrderDetailOrderID = source2@OrderID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		OrderDetailCreatedDate = source2@CreatedDate,
		OrderDetailUpdatedDate = source2@UpdatedDate,
		SourceSystemID,
		GlobalCustomerID
	)) ~> sink1
